short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed primary for https://v-link.preciconnect.net/.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can publish a stream that uses a video view of your screen (instead of a camera) as the source. A client connected to the session can subscribe to the stream (and view it), just as they would subscribe to a stream that uses a camera as the source.
